targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["new_status_code"]))
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with new_status_code: int(v: r.new_status_code) }) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["serial", "version", "model"]))

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node" and r["_field"] == "avg_processor_busy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node_disk" and r["_field"] == "busy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster_subsystem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["new_status_code"]))
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: int(v: r._value) }) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster_subsystem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["outstanding_alerts", "suppressed_alerts"]))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node" and r["_field"] == "total_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node" and r["_field"] == "total_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node" and r["_field"] == "total_ops")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "volume" and r["_field"] == "read_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node" and r["_field"] == "avg_processor_busy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node_disk" and r["_field"] == "busy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> group(columns: ["cluster"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster" or r["_measurement"] == "node")
  |> keep(columns: ["datacenter"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "datacenter")
list.name: Datacenter
list.query:

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster" or r["_measurement"] == "node")
  |> keep(columns: ["datacenter"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "datacenter")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster" or r["_measurement"] == "node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")

list.name: Cluster

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cluster" or r["_measurement"] == "node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> keep(columns: ["cluster"])
